org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom

Class CollisionPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Point
        • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.CollisionPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>, java.io.Serializable, Positionable, Updatable

    public class CollisionPoint
extends Point
implements Positionable
    An implementation of Point that allows for interpolation. Game objects can use this class to move around the game world and retrieve the appropriate rendering coordinates after interpolating between the previous and current position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
